snippet: HAMBURGER--Neil. Wonderful father, great grandfather. Love of life, Kathy. A miracle man. Always brought fun to a crowd. Will be so missed. Love to you in peace. Barbara and Philip Altheim 1/3
lead_paragraph: HAMBURGER--Neil. Wonderful father, great grandfather. Love of life, Kathy. A miracle man. Always brought fun to a crowd. Will be so missed. Love to you in peace. Barbara and Philip Altheim 1/3
